author: felicity
msg: Per bug 1316, it looks like mutt has a standard format to message-id.
I added a test meta rule to look for both the user-agent and message-id headers for USER_AGENT.
Also added a forged_mua rule to look for user-agent without message-id.  This doesn't score so well, but...

author: felicity
msg: Fix for bug 1303.  Code thought it had always deleted tokens.
